sentences.en: A lack of solemnity is not necessarily a lack of seriousness.
sentences.cn: 缺乏庄重并不必然意味着缺乏严肃.

sentences.en: An atmosphere of solemnity and reverencethe Great Hall the People.
sentences.cn: 人民大会堂在一片庄严肃穆的气氛中.

sentences.en: Cooper objected to its solemnity and selfrighteousness.
sentences.cn: 库珀反对它那付道貌岸然、自以为是的样子.

sentences.en: Cooper over the tomb of weeks, a quiet solemnity.
sentences.cn: 墓周古柏笼罩, 幽静肃穆.

sentences.en: He preserved his mask of solemnity even with acquaintances.
sentences.cn: 他甚至和熟人交往也保持着一本正经的面孔.

sentences.en: He spoke with solemnity and his colossal misshapen nose made what he said very quaint.
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地说清,他那丑陋的大鼻子使他说的话显得非常古怪.

sentences.en: He was smiling, but his eyes retained a look of solemnity.
sentences.cn: 他脸上挂着笑容，但眼神依旧严肃。

sentences.en: It was carried from the room in great solemnity, escorted by a Russian guard of honour.
sentences.cn: 它在俄国仪仗队的护送下,极其庄严隆重地从房里捧了出来.

sentences.en: My eyes must have been a little crazy with solemnity.
sentences.cn: 我双眼的庄重神情一定显得有点儿异样.

sentences.en: The hall is heavily painted with dragons and has an aura of solemnity and mystery.
sentences.cn: 整个大殿很浓重的用龙描绘着,让人感觉到神秘而严肃.

sentences.en: The judge took up the gavel with solemnity.
sentences.cn: 法官严肃地拿起了小木槌.

sentences.en: The monument was unveiled with great solemnity.
sentences.cn: 纪念碑的揭幕庄严而肃穆.

sentences.en: The Queen was crowned with all solemnity / with all the proper solemnities.
sentences.cn: 女王在隆重之至的典礼中加冕.

sentences.en: The setting for this morning's signing ceremony matched the solemnity of the occasion.
sentences.cn: 今天上午签字仪式的布置与该场合的严肃性非常协调。

sentences.en: the solemnity of a great religious occasion
sentences.cn: 重大宗教场合的庄严肃穆

sentences.en: There was a kind of solemnity in this interrogation.
sentences.cn: 在这一段对话期间,房间里的气氛很庄严.

words.tran_cn: 庄严的，严肃的；隆重的，郑重的
举行仪式；庄严化；隆重的庆祝
严肃起来；严肃地说（等于solemnize）
使庄严；使严肃；隆重庆祝

trans.tran_cn: 庄严，严肃，庄重，庄严的举止
trans.tran_en: the quality of being serious in behaviour or manner
